32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been narrated on the authority of Abu Ishaq who said:I heard from Bara' a similar tradition except that he said:" These people (the Meccans) rebelled against us

chapter.eng-name: The Battle of Al-Ahzab (The Confederates), also known as Al-Khandaq (The Ditch)
